bibl.title: Preliminary Observations on Legal Matters in P. Petra 10 (Petra Khaled and Suha Shoman).
Atti del XXII Congresso Internazionale di Papirologia. Firenze, 23-29 agosto 1998. Volume II
bibl.author: KOENEN, Ludwig

bibl.note: Preliminary presentation of P. Petra Inv. 10 (to be published in 2001). Between 527 and 537. - A Division of Property (Inv. 10: P. Petra Khaled and Suha Shoman). - Legal Terminology: The Example of Inv. 10. 192-209. - The Oath by the Emperor and the Holy Trinity. - P. 742: Addendum.
KOENEN Ludwig, Preliminary Observations on Legal Matters in P. Petra 10 (Petra Khaled and Suha Shoman).

Isabella ANDORLINI, Guido BASTIANINI, Manfredo MANFREDI e Giovanna MENCI (a cura di), Atti del XXII Congresso Internazionale di Papirologia. Firenze, 23-29 agosto 1998. Volume II (Firenze, 2001) pp. 727-742.
